sn56.17:2.1: 2 Rolling Forth the Wheel of Dhamma
sn56.17:4.1: Seated at one side that mendicant said to the Buddha:
sn56.17:4.2: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘ignorance’.
sn56.17:4.4: And how is an ignorant person defined?”
sn56.17:4.5: “Not knowing about suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
sn56.17:4.7: And this is how an ignorant person is defined.
sn56.17:5.1: That’s why you should practice meditation …”
